description: JavaScript source code for Bootstrap's collapse component (version 3.2.0), defining the Collapse class, its methods, and associated plugin API for collapsible UI elements.

classes.name: Collapse
classes.description: Class managing collapse/expand behavior for UI elements, including methods for show, hide, toggle, and dimension calculation.

methods.name: Collapse.prototype.dimension
methods.description: Determines whether the collapse element uses width or height for animation.

methods.name: Collapse.prototype.show
methods.description: Expands the collapse element with transition effects.

methods.name: Collapse.prototype.hide
methods.description: Collapses the element with transition effects.

methods.name: Collapse.prototype.toggle
methods.description: Toggles between expanded and collapsed states.
